name: 99 little Bugs in the code
description:
It was a tight deadline but you just completed your dream game. Maybe it's a good idea to do a bit of debugging before releasing it though? It will take max 20 seconds... you are a master programmer are you not?

Blast those bugs!

You have 20 seconds to remove as many bugs from your code as you can. The new advanced debug mode makes this quite easy ... just click on the bug and it will disappear. Although thoroughly tested (cough..cough) there may be a occasional hitch in the debugger. What could possibly go wrong?

---

Game made for the 20 second game jam.

Credits:

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
Bug design from macrovector / Freepik
